engine
Class Screen

java.lang.Object
  engine.Screen

public abstract class Screen
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class representing a screen to be overriden in subclasses Has a reference to the parent Application and requires onTick, onDraw, and onResize to be implemented in subclasses. Passes through onXXX events

Author:
dgattey
